front.title: Draft ISO/IEC/IEEE Guide Systems and software engineering-Guide for life cycle processes

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: This Technical Report is a guide for the life cycle management of systems and software based on ISO/IEC 15288 and ISO/IEC 12207. This guide addresses systems concepts and life cycle concepts, models, stages, processes, process application, key points of view, tailoring and use in various domains.
